title: Hong Kong police received over 80 complaints against JPEX crypto exchange
description:
JPEX crypto exchange has been named in at least 83 complaints to the Hong Kong police as of Friday, the South China Morning Post reported on Sept. 16. The complaints involve cryptocurrencies worth $4.3 million, the report noted. Raymond Siu Chak-yee, commissioner of police,Â  disclosed on Saturday that the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission […]

The post Hong Kong police received over 80 complaints against JPEX crypto exchange appeared first on CryptoSlate.
